message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique and valuable product that I think you'll really appreciate. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. Is this something you'd be interested in?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob, but I'm afraid I'm not willing to go as low as $80. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $110. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate the willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm glad we're getting closer, Bob. I can see you're serious about the product. I'm willing to meet you at $95. Is that a price you'd be willing to commit to?
I'm getting close, but I was thinking more along the lines of $92. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I think we're really close now, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $94. Is that a price you'd be willing to accept?
I'm really close, but I was thinking more along the lines of $91. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I think we're almost there, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $93. Is that a price you'd be willing to accept?
I'm really close to walking away, but I'm willing to make one final offer. I'll give you $92. Is that a price you'd be willing to accept?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I think we've been over this price a few times already. I'm willing to make one final counteroffer at $93. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'm going to have to consider selling the product to someone else.
I'm not willing to go any higher than $92. I'm going to have to think about walking away from the deal. Can you meet me at $92 or not?
